description:
Yuzuko and Momoko line up to get sweet potatoes from the school store. Momoko runs into Nagiko there, and through a serious of events, Momoko ends up believing she`s being disrespectful to girls in the other grades. Meanwhile, the occult club tries to solve a riddle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スイート・ビター・ポテト
